system.effect: Horrifying Servitor babies used to perform menial tasks. Permenant -1 Morale but +1d10+10 Achievement Points once per objective. Poor: -2 Morale, Good: 1d5+15 Achievement Points, Best: 20 Achievement Points. Only One per Vessel.
